name: Full Code
storyline: YOU become the emergency medicine physician in a hospital, with over 152 cases available Full Code offers a wide variety of tools and procedures to save patients in a safe simulation environment. A learning tool and game in one package.
summary: Full Code challenges you to take on complex clinical cases in a realistic 3D emergency room. Whether you are a medical student, resident, paramedic, nurse, PA or experienced physician you will enjoy the challenge of solving Full Code cases. Our library includes over 105 scenarios with a mix of common occurrences, trauma cases, pediatric cases, life-threatening illnesses and obscure diseases that you may only see once or twice in your career. We add 2 new scenarios each month and we frequently cover clinical hot-topics. Earn CME credit hours with realistic medical simulation.
